name: Live Vlog: Bombardier CS300 Inaugural Flight Announcement!
description:
Follow me on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram for the latest on tomorrow's trip for the inaugural CS300 flight!

Facebook: facebook.com/inflightvideo
Twitter: twitter.com/inflightvideo
Instagram: instagram.com/inflightvideo

Hopefully live streams throughout the day too!

The latest from inflight Video as and when it happens.  Live vlogs, updates on our flights, live streams from airports and more.
